title: Report Usage Response
description: Response from report_usage. Partial acceptance is valid — records that pass validation are stored even when others fail.

accepted.description: Number of usage records successfully stored.

errors.description: Validation errors for individual records. The field property identifies which record failed (e.g., 'usage[1].pricing_option_id').

sandbox.description: When true, the account is a sandbox account and no billing occurred.

examples.description: Partial acceptance — one record failed validation
